meanings.definition: A spicy condiment made of fruits or vegetables with vinegar, sugar, and spices.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat chutney with my samosas.
meanings.sent2: She added a dollop of chutney to her curry for extra flavor.
meanings.sent3: The chutney danced on my taste buds with its spicy kick.
meanings.sent4: The chutney was a burst of flavor in my mouth, like a firework of taste.
meanings.sent5: The chutney was so delicious, it made the whole meal unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: She decided to chutney the mangoes for the winter.
meanings.sent2: They chutneyed the tomatoes to enjoy them all year round.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally chutneyed the wrong batch of fruits, and now everything tastes spicy!
meanings.sent4: The tradition of chutneying food has been passed down for generations.
meanings.sent5: Chutneying the vegetables was a way to savor the harvest for months to come.
